nodes.text: Coth Fuuras space station was a space station popular with freighter and passenger liners. It was a curved station, with a ring rotating a central gravity core.

In 19 BBY, Squad 40—a clone commando squad from the 501st Legion's Imperial Commando Special Unit—tried to capture Borik Yelgo, a fugitive Jedi Knight. After a short skirmish, Yelgo was killed—shot in the head twice by Rede—while trying to bring down a heavy transparisteel wall on the commandos.
